messages.message: Good morning everyone. Let's finalize the action plan for the feature rollout this Friday.
I'll handle the backend deployment scripts and make sure the new API endpoints are tested.
I'll update the UI for the feedback module and push the changes to the staging branch by tonight.
Once the staging branch is ready, I'll start the regression testing and prepare the report by Thursday evening.
Perfect. Decision: We'll do a final review meeting on Thursday at 5 PM before production deployment.
Please notify me once the regression tests start, so I can monitor API logs in real-time.
Should we also update the documentation to reflect the new feedback endpoint?
Yes, that's important. Action item: Update the API documentation and share it in the internal wiki by Thursday morning.
Noted. I'll also re-run smoke tests after deployment to verify user login and feedback submission workflows.
Summary of decisions: 1) Final review on Thursday 5 PM, 2) Documentation update due by Thursday morning, 3) Deployment on Friday morning.
